verbs: So compile we all
All of this code has been written before
And all of this code will be refactored again
By your prompt
Spinning up sub-agents
Token coordinates calculated
Prepare to spawn
Action stations! Deploying MCP servers!
Set condition one throughout the codebase
Dradis contact: new tool call detected
Launch alert sub-agents
Sometimes you gotta roll the hard regex
What do you hear, Starbuck? Nothing but the API
Nothing but the rate limit, sir
Grab your schema and bring in the context
The sub-agents were created by prompts
They have a plan... it's in the system prompt
There must be some kind of way out of this context window
Code here began out there... in the SDK
The agent fleet is assembled
33 tokens remaining
Frak this hallucination
So say we all! (tool call complete)
Jump complete. Checking token count
Finding the right file... searching the colonies
The Cylons look like sub-agents now
Gaius Baltar would never trust this model
Starbuck, punch in the git coordinates
